title: tillaana (dheem dheem dheem dhirana)
sahitya:
dhIm dhIm dhIm dirana dhIm dirana tana diranana 

(dhIm)



anupallavi



dhIm dhIm dhIm dirana dhIm dirana tAni taka

ditlAm tarikiTa tOm ditlAm tarikiTa tOm ditlAm tarikiTa tOm 

(dhIm)



caraNam



mayilai vAzh varuvamar kuzhali umaiyE iniyum nAn

tuyarilAzhndiDa tagumO dayai varumO vinai arumO



solkaTTu



tAm takiTa jhamta jhamta kiTataka takadhimi tOm takiTa tOm takiTa

tOm taka tOmta tOm tOm

dhIm dhIm dhIm dirana dhIm dirana tAnitaka dhIm dhIm dhIm dhIm

jhaNu tataka dhIm dhIm

dhIm dhIm jhaNU tataka dhIm dhIm dhIm jhaNU tataka 

(dhIm)
